titles.title: He Took The Chains From My Heart And Set Me Free

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He took the chains from my heart and set me free.
He gave me joy, now I'm happy as can be.
He brought me out of sinking sand.
Placed my feet on higher ground.
He took the chains from my heart and set me free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He took the chains from my feet and set me free.
He gives me strength now I'm walking perfectly.
He took me out of Satan's hand,
Set me in the promised land.
He took the chains from my feet and set me free.
